title: how  can I copy my firefox profile from my Windows PC's external SSD to my Macbook Pro?
content:
My windows pc died. I removed the SSD and have it plugged into my MACBookPro, trying to copy my firefox profile into my MAC, but the instructions online are not clear and I can't find my Profile in my external Windows 10 SSD, to copy it onto my MACBook Pro's Desktop and then to copy my profile it into the Firefox on my MACBook Pro.

Can anyone help me?
creator: DrHeshie

title: Why can't the Cache Size Variables be changed via the FF Options?  This Feature was available in Older Versions!
content: The Subject Line says what I need to say!
